00001 /* Windows PE Export Sections (SgAsmPEExportSection and related classes) */
00002 
00003 #include "sage3basic.h"
00004 #include "MemoryMap.h"

00006 /* Constructor */
00007 void
00008 SgAsmPEExportDirectory::ctor(SgAsmPEExportSection *section)
00009 {
00010     SgAsmPEFileHeader *fhdr = isSgAsmPEFileHeader(section->get_header());
00011     ROSE_ASSERT(fhdr!=NULL);
00012     set_parent(section);
00013 
00014     /* Read disk-formatted export directory */
00015     PEExportDirectory_disk disk;
00016     try {
00017         section->read_content(fhdr->get_loader_map(), section->get_mapped_actual_va(), &disk, sizeof disk);
00018     } catch (const MemoryMap::NotMapped &e) {
00019         fprintf(stderr, "SgAsmPEExportDirectory::ctor: error: export directory at RVA 0x%08"PRIx64
00020                 " contains unmapped virtual address 0x%08"PRIx64"\n", section->get_mapped_actual_va(), e.va);
00021         if (e.map) {
00022             fprintf(stderr, "Memory map in effect at time of error:\n");
00023             e.map->dump(stderr, "    ");
00024         }
00025         memset(&disk, 0, sizeof disk);
00026     }
00027     
00028     /* Convert disk-format data members to native format */
00029     p_res1         = le_to_host(disk.res1);
00030     p_timestamp    = le_to_host(disk.timestamp);
00031     p_vmajor       = le_to_host(disk.vmajor);
00032     p_vminor       = le_to_host(disk.vminor);
00033     p_name_rva     = le_to_host(disk.name_rva);       p_name_rva.set_section(section);
00034     p_ord_base     = le_to_host(disk.ord_base);
00035     p_expaddr_n    = le_to_host(disk.expaddr_n);
00036     p_nameptr_n    = le_to_host(disk.nameptr_n);
00037     p_expaddr_rva  = le_to_host(disk.expaddr_rva);    p_expaddr_rva.set_section(section);
00038     p_nameptr_rva  = le_to_host(disk.nameptr_rva);    p_nameptr_rva.set_section(section);
00039     p_ordinals_rva = le_to_host(disk.ordinals_rva);   p_ordinals_rva.set_section(section);
00040 
00041     /* Read the name */
00042     std::string name;
00043     try {
00044         name = section->read_content_str(fhdr->get_loader_map(), p_name_rva.get_rva());
00045     } catch (const MemoryMap::NotMapped &e) {
00046         fprintf(stderr, "SgAsmPEExportDirectory::ctor: warning: directory name at RVA 0x%08"PRIx64
00047                 " contains unmapped virtual address 0x%08"PRIx64"\n", p_name_rva.get_rva(), e.va);
00048         if (e.map) {
00049             fprintf(stderr, "Memory map in effect at time of error:\n");
00050             e.map->dump(stderr, "    ");
00051         }
00052         memset(&disk, 0, sizeof disk);
00053     }
00054     p_name = new SgAsmBasicString(name);
00055     p_name->set_parent(this);
00056 }
00057 
00058 /* Print debugging info */
00059 void
00060 SgAsmPEExportDirectory::dump(FILE *f, const char *prefix, ssize_t idx) const
00061 {
00062     char p[4096];
00063     if (idx>=0) {
00064         sprintf(p, "%sPEExportDirectory[%zd].", prefix, idx);
00065     } else {
00066         sprintf(p, "%sPEExportDirectory.", prefix);
00067     }
00068     const int w = std::max(1, DUMP_FIELD_WIDTH-(int)strlen(p));
00069     
00070     fprintf(f, "%s%-*s = \"%s\"\n",                    p, w, "name", p_name->get_string(true).c_str());
00071     fprintf(f, "%s%-*s = 0x%08x (%u)\n",               p, w, "res1", p_res1, p_res1);
00072     fprintf(f, "%s%-*s = %lu %s",                      p, w, "timestamp", (unsigned long)p_timestamp, ctime(&p_timestamp));
00073     fprintf(f, "%s%-*s = %u\n",                        p, w, "vmajor", p_vmajor);
00074     fprintf(f, "%s%-*s = %u\n",                        p, w, "vminor", p_vminor);
00075     fprintf(f, "%s%-*s = %s\n",                        p, w, "name_rva", p_name_rva.to_string().c_str());
00076     fprintf(f, "%s%-*s = %u\n",                        p, w, "ord_base", p_ord_base);
00077     fprintf(f, "%s%-*s = %zu\n",                       p, w, "expaddr_n", p_expaddr_n);
00078     fprintf(f, "%s%-*s = %zu\n",                       p, w, "nameptr_n", p_nameptr_n);
00079     fprintf(f, "%s%-*s = %s\n",                        p, w, "expaddr_rva", p_expaddr_rva.to_string().c_str());
00080     fprintf(f, "%s%-*s = %s\n",                        p, w, "nameptr_rva", p_nameptr_rva.to_string().c_str());
00081     fprintf(f, "%s%-*s = %s\n",                        p, w, "ordinals_rva", p_ordinals_rva.to_string().c_str());
00082 }

00085 void
00086 SgAsmPEExportEntry::ctor(SgAsmGenericString *fname, unsigned ordinal, rose_rva_t expaddr, SgAsmGenericString *forwarder)
00087 {
00088     set_name(fname);
00089     if (fname)
00090         fname->set_parent(this);
00091 
00092     set_ordinal(ordinal);
00093     set_export_rva(expaddr);
00094     set_forwarder(forwarder);
00095 }

00097 /* Print debugging info */
00098 void
00099 SgAsmPEExportEntry::dump(FILE *f, const char *prefix, ssize_t idx) const
00100 {
00101     char p[4096];
00102     if (idx>=0) {
00103         sprintf(p, "%sPEExportEntry[%zd].", prefix, idx);
00104     } else {
00105         sprintf(p, "%sPEExportEntry.", prefix);
00106     }
00107     const int w = std::max(1, DUMP_FIELD_WIDTH-(int)strlen(p));
00108 
00109     fprintf(f, "%s%-*s = [ord %u] rva=%s \"%s\"", p, w, "info",
00110             p_ordinal, p_export_rva.to_string().c_str(), p_name->get_string(true).c_str());
00111     if (p_forwarder)
00112         fprintf(f, " -> \"%s\"", p_forwarder->get_string(true).c_str());
00113     fputc('\n', f);
00114 }

00116 /* Override ROSETTA to set parent */
00117 void
00118 SgAsmPEExportEntry::set_name(SgAsmGenericString *fname)
00119 {
00120     if (p_name!=fname)
00121         set_isModified(true);
00122     p_name = fname;
00123     if (p_name) p_name->set_parent(this);
00124 }

00129         set_isModified(true);
00130     p_forwarder = forwarder;
00131     if (p_forwarder) p_forwarder->set_parent(this);

00134 /* Constructor */
00135 void
00136 SgAsmPEExportSection::ctor()
00137 {
00138     ROSE_ASSERT(p_exports  == NULL);
00139     p_exports = new SgAsmPEExportEntryList();
00140     p_exports->set_parent(this);

00142 
00143 SgAsmPEExportSection*
00144 SgAsmPEExportSection::parse()
00145 {
00146     SgAsmPESection::parse();
00147 
00148     SgAsmPEFileHeader *fhdr = dynamic_cast<SgAsmPEFileHeader*>(get_header());
00149     ROSE_ASSERT(fhdr!=NULL);
00150 
00151     p_export_dir = new SgAsmPEExportDirectory(this);
00152 
00153     /* The export directory points to three parallel arrays:
00154      *   1. An array of RVAs that point to NUL-terminated names.
00155      *   2. An array of "ordinals" which serve as indices into the Export Address Table.
00156      *   3. An array of export addresses (see note below). */
00157     for (size_t i=0; i<p_export_dir->get_nameptr_n(); i++) {
00158         /* Function name RVA (nameptr)*/
00159         ExportNamePtr_disk nameptr_disk = 0;
00160         rose_addr_t nameptr_rva = p_export_dir->get_nameptr_rva().get_rva() + i*sizeof(nameptr_disk);
00161         try {
00162             read_content(fhdr->get_loader_map(), nameptr_rva, &nameptr_disk, sizeof nameptr_disk);
00163         } catch (const MemoryMap::NotMapped &e) {
00164             fprintf(stderr, "SgAsmPEExportSection::parse: error: export name rva %zu at RVA 0x%08"PRIx64
00165                     " contains unmapped virtual address 0x%08"PRIx64"\n", i, nameptr_rva, e.va);
00166             if (e.map) {
00167                 fprintf(stderr, "Memory map in effect at time of error:\n");
00168                 e.map->dump(stderr, "    ");
00169             }
00170             nameptr_disk = 0;
00171         }
00172         rose_addr_t nameptr = le_to_host(nameptr_disk);
00173 
00174         /* Function name (fname) */
00175         std::string s;
00176         try {
00177             s = read_content_str(fhdr->get_loader_map(), nameptr);
00178         } catch (const MemoryMap::NotMapped &e) {
00179             fprintf(stderr, "SgAsmPEExportSection::parse: error: export name %zu at RVA 0x%08"PRIx64
00180                     " contains unmapped virtual address 0x%08"PRIx64"\n", i, nameptr, e.va);
00181             if (e.map) {
00182                 fprintf(stderr, "Memory map in effect at time of error:\n");
00183                 e.map->dump(stderr, "    ");
00184             }
00185         }
00186         SgAsmGenericString *fname = new SgAsmBasicString(s);
00187 
00188         /* Ordinal (sort of an index into the Export Address Table) */
00189         ExportOrdinal_disk ordinal_disk = 0;
00190         rose_addr_t ordinal_rva = p_export_dir->get_ordinals_rva().get_rva() + i*sizeof(ordinal_disk);
00191         try {
00192             read_content(fhdr->get_loader_map(), ordinal_rva, &ordinal_disk, sizeof ordinal_disk);
00193         } catch (const MemoryMap::NotMapped &e) {
00194             fprintf(stderr, "SgAsmPEExportSection::parse: error: ordinal %zu at RVA 0x%08"PRIx64
00195                     " contains unmapped virtual address 0x%08"PRIx64"\n", i, ordinal_rva, e.va);
00196             if (e.map) {
00197                 fprintf(stderr, "Memory map in effect at time of error:\n");
00198                 e.map->dump(stderr, "    ");
00199             }
00200             ordinal_disk = 0;
00201         }
00202         unsigned ordinal = le_to_host(ordinal_disk);
00203 
00204         /* Export address. Convert the symbol's Ordinal into an index into the Export Address Table. The spec says to subtract
00205          * the ord_base from the Ordinal to get the index, but testing has shown this to be off by one (e.g., Windows-XP file
00206          * /WINDOWS/system32/msacm32.dll's Export Table's first symbol has the name "XRegThunkEntry" with an Ordinal of zero
00207          * and the ord_base is one. The index according to spec would be -1 rather than the correct value of zero.) */
00208         rose_rva_t expaddr = 0;
00209         if (ordinal >= (p_export_dir->get_ord_base()-1)) {
00210             unsigned expaddr_idx = ordinal - (p_export_dir->get_ord_base()-1);
00211             ROSE_ASSERT(expaddr_idx < p_export_dir->get_expaddr_n());
00212             ExportAddress_disk expaddr_disk = 0;
00213             rose_addr_t expaddr_rva = p_export_dir->get_expaddr_rva().get_rva() + expaddr_idx*sizeof(expaddr_disk);
00214             try {
00215                 read_content(fhdr->get_loader_map(), expaddr_rva, &expaddr_disk, sizeof expaddr_disk);
00216             } catch (const MemoryMap::NotMapped &e) {
00217                 fprintf(stderr, "SgAsmPEExportSection::parse: error: export address %zu at RVA 0x%08"PRIx64
00218                         " contains unmapped virtual address 0x%08"PRIx64"\n", i, expaddr_rva, e.va);
00219                 if (e.map) {
00220                     fprintf(stderr, "Memory map in effect at time of error:\n");
00221                     e.map->dump(stderr, "    ");
00222                 }
00223             }
00224             expaddr = le_to_host(expaddr_disk);
00225             expaddr.bind(fhdr);
00226         } else {
00227             expaddr = 0xffffffff; /*Ordinal out of range!*/
00228         }
00229 
00230         /* If export address is within this section then it points to a NUL-terminated forwarder name.
00231          * FIXME: Is this the proper precondition? [RPM 2009-08-20] */
00232         SgAsmGenericString *forwarder = NULL;
00233         if (expaddr.get_va()>=get_mapped_actual_va() && expaddr.get_va()<get_mapped_actual_va()+get_mapped_size()) {
00234             std::string s;
00235             try {
00236                 s = read_content_str(fhdr->get_loader_map(), expaddr.get_rva());
00237             } catch (const MemoryMap::NotMapped &e) {
00238                 fprintf(stderr, "SgAsmPEExportSection::parse: error: forwarder %zu at RVA 0x%08"PRIx64
00239                         " contains unmapped virtual address 0x%08"PRIx64"\n", i, expaddr.get_rva(), e.va);
00240                 if (e.map) {
00241                     fprintf(stderr, "Memory map in effect at time of error:\n");
00242                     e.map->dump(stderr, "    ");
00243                 }
00244             }
00245             forwarder = new SgAsmBasicString(s);
00246         }
00247 
00248         SgAsmPEExportEntry *entry = new SgAsmPEExportEntry(fname, ordinal, expaddr, forwarder);
00249         add_entry(entry);
00250     }
00251     return this;
00252 }
00253 
00254 void
00255 SgAsmPEExportSection::add_entry(SgAsmPEExportEntry *entry)
00256 {
00257     ROSE_ASSERT(p_exports!=NULL);
00258     p_exports->set_isModified(true);
00259     p_exports->get_exports().push_back(entry);
00260 }
00261 
00262 /* Print debugging info */
00263 void
00264 SgAsmPEExportSection::dump(FILE *f, const char *prefix, ssize_t idx) const
00265 {
00266     char p[4096];
00267     if (idx>=0) {
00268         sprintf(p, "%sPEExportSection[%zd].", prefix, idx);
00269     } else {
00270         sprintf(p, "%sPEExportSection.", prefix);
00271     }
00272     
00273     SgAsmPESection::dump(f, p, -1);
00274 
00275     if (p_export_dir)
00276         p_export_dir->dump(f, p, -1);
00277     for (size_t i=0; i<p_exports->get_exports().size(); i++)
00278         p_exports->get_exports()[i]->dump(f, p, i);
00279 
00280     if (variantT() == V_SgAsmPEExportSection) //unless a base class
00281         hexdump(f, 0, std::string(p)+"data at ", p_data);
00282 }
